alert.note: Alert for Greene; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 4:08AM EST until March 05 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers... Great Miami River at Sidney. Mad River at Springfield. Scioto River at Circleville. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... Great Miami River at Miamitown. Little Miami River at Spring Valley. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers... Little Miami River at Milford. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Miami River at Spring Valley. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Water rises into low-lying areas close to the river near Spring Valley, Roxanna and east of Waynesville. Water floods Corwin Road, as well as Waynesville and Middletown Roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM EST Saturday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
